action.description: From committee: Amend, and do pass as amended.Placed on General File.Read third time. Amended. (Amend. No. 1000.)Reprinting dispensed with.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved, as amended. (Yeas: 16, Nays: 5.) To printer.From printer. To re-engrossment. Re-engrossed. Second reprint. To Assembly.In Assembly.Senate Amendment No. 1000 concurred in. To enrollment.
